Unofficial D&D Classic Bx Edition on Foundry VTT requires D&D Basic/Expert Edition. Find the game at DMSGuild website.

This third party product is not affiliated with or approved by Wizards of the Coast. D&D is a trademark of Wizard of the Coast. The trademark and D&D logo are used with permission of WotC, under license. Permission to use D&D in the ruleset title granted by WotC.

Brought to life on Foundry VTT by U~man with OSE Essential. Currently maintained by Philipp Hoffmann, who assigns his contributions to PhilHoffm. See the GitHub repo for a full list of contributors.

Report your issues on GitHub or by using the Bug Reporter module in Foundry VTT.
